title: Executive Order 8315-Making Certain Changes in Customs Collection District No. 38
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 1 of the act of August 1, 1914, 38 Stat. 609, 623 (U.S.C., title 19, sec. 2), it is ordered that the following changes be, and they are hereby, made in Customs Collection District No. 38 (Michigan):
1. The designation of Grand Haven, Michigan, as a customs port of entry is revoked.
2. The city of Muskegon, Michigan, is designated as a customs port of entry.
This order shall become effective thirty days from the date hereof.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8315-Making Certain Changes in Customs Collection District No. 38 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368710
